card.name: PhonePe SBI Card SELECT BLACK
card.bank: SBI Cards and Payment Services Limited
card.description: A credit card offering rewards and benefits tailored for PhonePe users with privileges including welcome benefits, reward points, milestone benefits, lounge access, fuel surcharge waiver, and more.
card.target_audience: Individuals who frequently use PhonePe and seek rewards on PhonePe spends, online spends, and other spends with additional travel and lifestyle benefits.

rewards.program: PhonePe SBI Card SELECT BLACK Reward Program

categories.name: PhonePe & Pincode spends
categories.description: Earn 10 Reward Points per Rs. 100 on eligible PhonePe and Pincode spends.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Accelerated RPs on PhonePe spends applicable only on select categories - Recharges, Utilities, Bill Payments, Insurance, Travel and PhonePe PINCODE. Identification based on PhonePeâ€™s MID or TID. Max 2000 points per month.
categories.how_to_earn: Make transactions on PhonePe app or Pincode spends using the card.
categories.validity: Points forfeited if no transaction for 13 months or on card closure after 30 days.
categories.exclusions: No reward points on fuel transactions, wallet upload, rent payment, education services, government spends, EMI transactions, cash withdrawal.

categories.name: Online spends
categories.description: Earn 5 Reward Points per Rs. 100 on eligible online spends.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Max 2000 points per month. Utilities and Insurance spends outside PhonePe accrue base points only.
categories.how_to_earn: Make online transactions using the card.

categories.name: Other spends
categories.description: Earn 1 Reward Point per Rs. 100 on other spends.

bonus_rates.condition: Scan & Pay transactions using PhonePe SBI Card SELECT BLACK
bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: All Scan & Pay transactions made using the card will accrue 1% Value Back.

redemption.option: Redeem Reward Points for vouchers or cash
redemption.process: Redeem points against a wide array of vouchers or for cash via the SBI Card platform.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Points forfeited on non-payment, fraud, card closure, or inactivity. Taxes or charges on redemption borne by cardholder.
redemption.validity: Points forfeited after 13 months of inactivity or 30 days after card closure.

benefits.name: PhonePe Gift Card
benefits.description: Rs. 1,500 PhonePe Gift Card issued after payment of joining fee.
benefits.how_to_avail: Gift card sent to registered mobile number within 45 days of joining fee realization.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Card account must be in good standing. Voucher valid for 12 months from adding to gift card balance. Cannot be redeemed in parts or for cash.
benefits.validity: 12 months from adding to gift card balance
benefits.eligibility: Payment of joining fee Rs. 1,499 + taxes

benefits.name: Yatra Voucher
benefits.description: Yatra Voucher worth Rs. 5,000 on achieving annual spends of Rs. 5 lakh.
benefits.how_to_avail: Voucher sent to registered mobile number/email within 30 days of reaching spend milestone.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Voucher valid for flight, hotel, holiday bookings on Yatra. Single transaction use only. Non-refundable, non-transferable. Valid for 4 months from issue date.

benefits.name: International Lounge Program
benefits.description: Complimentary Priority Pass membership worth $99 for first two years.

benefits.name: Domestic Lounge Program
benefits.description: 4 complimentary domestic lounge visits per year (max 1 per quarter).

benefits.name: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions from Rs. 500 to Rs. 4,000 at petrol pumps in India.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use card for fuel transactions within specified limits.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Waiver excludes GST and other charges.
benefits.usage_limit: Max Rs. 250 waiver per statement cycle

benefits.name: Contactless Advantage
benefits.description: Tap to pay with VISA PayWave for fast, secure transactions.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Unique security key ensures only one transaction per tap.

benefits.name: Cash Withdrawal
benefits.description: Withdraw cash from over 1 million ATMs worldwide.

benefits.name: Add-on Cards
benefits.description: Empower up to 3 family members with add-on cards.
benefits.how_to_avail: Request add-on cards for eligible family members above 18 years.

benefits.name: Flexipay
benefits.description: Convert transactions of Rs. 2,500 or more into easy monthly installments.
benefits.how_to_avail: Transact Rs. 2,500+ and convert within 30 days on sbicard.com.

benefits.name: Balance Transfer on EMI
benefits.description: Transfer outstanding balances from other credit cards to this card at lower interest and pay in EMIs.
benefits.how_to_avail: Log in to sbicard.com to avail.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Annual fee reversed on spends of Rs. 3 lakh or more in previous membership year.
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Fee reversal preconditioned on fee levied during renewal cycle.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Reversal on spends of Rs. 3 lakh or more in previous membership year.
fees_and_charges.frequency: Per annum from second year onwards
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Fee reversal preconditioned on fee levied during renewal cycle.
